title: Inside Out Thought Bubbles v1.8.1 Unlimited Lives mod
description:
From the creators of Frozen Free Fall and Whereâ€™s My Water?, Disney Games brings you this one-of-a-kind bubble-shooter based on the newest Disneyâ€¢Pixar film, Inside Out!

Growing up can be a bumpy road, and itâ€™s no exception for Riley. Like all of us, Riley is guided by her Emotions â€” Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness. The Emotions live in Headquarters, the control center inside Rileyâ€™s mind, where they help advise her through everyday life. Join Riley's Emotions on a journey to match and sort memory bubbles, as you travel through unique locations inspired by the film â€” Family Island, Dream Productions, Boy Band Island, Imagination Land and more. Play this bubble shooter that twists the puzzle genre inside out!

â€¢ SHOOT & MATCH memory bubbles for each emotion
â€¢ UNLOCK characters as you explore over 200 levels, each with a challenging new puzzle

â€¢ CONNECT toto gift and receive free lives, and see you how you stack up against your friends!

Whatâ€™s new:
